nodes.documentation:
Constrctor function

     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens

     * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account

     * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address

     * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf

     * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
nodes.name: approve
approveAndCall

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens

     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

     * @param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account

     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

     * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burnFrom

nodes.documentation:
@dev adds an adminList
function is called only by the authorized owner address
nodes.name: addAdmin

nodes.documentation:
StoreOwners Registers a new storefront. 
currently a participant self-adding strorefront
param: _storeName: Name of the store.
nodes.name: addStorefront

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(bytes memory => mapping(uint256 => bytes storage ref))

nodes.documentation:
StoreOwners Registers a new item to shelve. 
param: _itemName: Name of an item.
param: _description: Detail of an item.
param: _price: unit price of an item.
param: _storeref: A unique  Id to the store.
param: _quantity: Unit of ireferencetem to add.
nodes.name: addItemToStore

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(bytes memory => mapping(uint256 => bytes storage ref))
literal_string "Amount cannot be less than total price"

arguments.value: Amount cannot be less than total price

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount cannot be less than total price"

nodes.documentation:
@dev UnRegisters a store from the Storefront 
currently only an admin is able to remove store
nodes.name: unregisterStore
